user-admin-name.description: Login name for the administrator user

user-admin-password.description: Login password for the administrator user

php-timezone.description: The main timezone for the size

php-storage.description: How to store the data (json, mysql)

comment-notification-admin.description: Email address where to send the administration notifications

comment-moderation.description: Whether comments must be approved before they appear to other visitors

comment-name.description: Allow the user to enter a name

comment-email.description: Allow the user to enter an email address

comment-email-mandatory.description: Force the user to enter an email address

comment-notification-user.description: Allow the user to choose to be notified

comment-website.description: Allow user to enter a website (shown next to the name)

comment-popular-likes.description: Number of likes to become popular

comment-popular-reply.description: Number of replies to become popular

comment-content-format.description: Format for the comment content (markdown, html, text, bbcode)

comment-content-images.description: Allow links to external images in the comments

ui-theme.description: HTML and CSS theme the interface

ui-title-level.description: H# for the comments area title

content-form-position.description: Where the comments form is placed (top, bottom)

comment-avatar-mode.description: How to display the avatar icon (image, count, none)

comment-avatar-size.description: Size of the avatar icon in pixels

comment-reply-mode.description: How to display the list of replies (thread, stream)

comment-form-labels.description: Display labels above the input fields

comment-user-subscribe.description: Wheter the user can subscribe to email notifications (// TODO was allowsUserReplies)

comment-image-format.description: Allowed image types when embedded images are allowed

senape-rss.description: Wheter to allow an RSS feed

senape-ipaddress-store.description: Allow to store the users' IP addresses

senape-spam-remote.description: Whether to use the remote spam detection

senape-spam-js.description: Whether to perform the spam check in javascript

api-latest-max.description: Maximum number of comments to save as latest comments (probably for the API)

api-latest-trim.description: Number of characters to trim latest comments to, 0 for no trim (probably for the API)

database-charset.description: Database charset (TODO: is it really needed?)
